attributes.action: Allow education to end when you are 16 years old.
attributes.background: This is because children finish GCSE when they are 16 and do not need further education after 16; if so then university should be for FREE instead of spending £9000 a year for education as some families cannot afford these funds as they are extortionate

rejection.details:
We are not sure whether you would like the Government to increase the education leaving age above 16 or to fully fund post-16 education places.

You could start a new petition setting out clearly what you would like the UK Government or Parliament to do.
